SEARCH
Package wtf.file.api.editable.data

Schnittstelle EditableFrame

Alle Superschnittstellen:
Frame
Alle bekannten Unterschnittstellen:
EditableWtfImage
public interface EditableFrame extends Frame
An interface extending Frame to provide editable functionality for individual image frames.

This interface allows modification of pixel data and enables setting the frame content from a Image.

  • Methodenübersicht

  • Methodendetails

    • pixels

      EditablePixel[][] pixels()
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: Frame
      Retrieves the 2D array of pixels that make up the frame.
      Angegeben von:
      pixels in Schnittstelle Frame
      Gibt zurück:
      a two-dimensional array of Pixel objects.

    • at

      EditablePixel at(int x, int y) throws NumberOutOfBoundsException
      Retrieves an editable pixel at the specified (x, y) coordinate.
      Angegeben von:
      at in Schnittstelle Frame
      Parameter:
      x - the horizontal (column) position of the pixel, starting from 0.
      y - the vertical (row) position of the pixel, starting from 0.
      Gibt zurück:
      the EditablePixel at the given coordinate.
      Löst aus:
      NumberOutOfBoundsException - if the coordinates are outside the frame dimensions.

    • byJavaImage

      void byJavaImage(BufferedImage image)
      Sets the content of this frame using a standard Java BufferedImage.

      This method allows the frame to be populated with an BufferedImage, which could be used to import image data or manipulate the frame based on external image sources.

      Parameter:
      image - the BufferedImage to set as the content of this frame.
